Lynchburg.Brightwells Mill Complex: The Brightwells Mill Complex historic 19th-century mill complex at 586 Brightwells Mill Road in Madison Heights, Amherst County, Virginia. It includes a reconstructed 1826 wood-frame mill, dam, miller's house, a number of outbuildings, and a small cemetery. The dam and mill both date to 1942, when a flash flood destroyed 19th-century structures.
